snippet: In this week's New York Times Magazine, Matt Bai writes that more than a decade after he last held office, Bob Kerry would like to lead the Senate toward consensus. He is prepared for unpleasantness.
abstract: In this week's New York Times Magazine, Matt Bai writes that more than a decade after he last held office, Bob Kerry would like to lead the Senate toward consensus. He is prepared for unpleasantness.

headline.main: Yes, Bob Kerrey Wants to Go Back to Washington
